item.title: At.st augustines bus stop, 8th December

item.title: There's loads of bit of papaer scattered on the grass verge, 8th December
item.description:

item.title: Section of road with now lighting, 8th December
item.description:
This section of road has no lighting. There is a missing centre reservation lamp post that is laying on the Plumstead bound bank. I take a car has crashed into a lamp post and damaged the cable feeding this section of road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, Greater London

item.title: Sharp huge level drop by hard and softer surface tarmac failing, 8th December
item.description:
Nearby address: 4 B519, London N6 4BT There is a sharp change of surface and a big sinkhole created due to hard and soft tarmac and level sinking. Car bottomed down with big noise and whole car seemed to have got the impact. At night it is very difficult to notice as going downhill and bad street illumination and even though I was going 16mph the car might have damage on the subframe or suspension armâ€¦ difficult to tell. I have video of the bang and evidence of speed and result. Tomorrow will have to take the car to the garage to double check if anything is broken or bent.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
